short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get sales and marketing inspiration every time you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are in sales or marketing you will love SAMI. Every time you open a new tab in Chrome SAMI will show you one beautiful data visualization and one quote that will make you smarter and better at marketing and sales.

SAMI is powered by The Conversion Code, a bestselling business book whose author spends 1,000's of hours researching and sourcing the data and insights served up by SAMI.
